channel.title: JC-Scape Rebirth
channel.description:
Welcome to the Rebirth of JC-Scape 639. This JC-Scape 639, is a tad different but alot alike. I have a cool looking portal page, for Avial Online, and JC-Scape.
Server Status: [COLOR="Green"]ONLINE[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1ewci1.png[/img]
[B]*NOTE*[/B] - I am currently in beta mode and testing for bug's. As of beta mode, it will be hosted on my computer for temp time. Download Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e2mpeffjq8g7nfy]http://www.mediafire.com/?e2mpeffjq8g7nfy[/url] - The updated link. Server is now on 24/7.
NEW* Added webclient: [URL=http://"http://rs.jcscape.co.cc"]Play Now[/URL]
Website: [URL=http://"http://www.jcscape.co.cc"]Click Me[/URL] Forums: [URL=http://"http://forum.jcscape.co.cc"]Click Me[/URL] [COLOR="RoyalBlue"] *Features[/COLOR]
[ul][*]Combat [*]Most Skills [*]Friends & Ignore list [*]Clan Chat [*]Notes workin [*]Clan Wars (Not Safe) [*]Clan Wars (safe pk box) [*]Nex, Corp, ETC [*]Cool Home [*]Castle Wars [*]Duel Arena [*]Warriors Guild[/ul]
[COLOR="RoyalBlue"]*TODO[/COLOR]
[ul][*]God Wars [*]Pest Control [*]Dungeoneering[/ul]
[COLOR="RoyalBlue"]*Media[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/209oms3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/ilx10m.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34fege0.png[/img]
More pics comming soon.
[COLOR="RoyalBlue"]*Credits[/COLOR]
[ul][*]Dementhium Team [*]Tutorial Help [*]Me[/ul]
